quotes.text: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If you are bitter, you are like a dry leaf that you can just squash, and you can get blown away by the wind. There is much more wisdom in forgiveness.
quotes.author: Vusi Mahlasela

quotes.text: It is very easy to forgive others their mistakes; it takes more grit to forgive them for having witnessed your own.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.text: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Two persons cannot long be friends if they cannot forgive each other's little failings.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruy√®re

quotes.text: I do not know the American gentleman, god forgive me for putting two such words together.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy
